creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: dark red with some white, yellow, green; scroll design embroidery on both sides; 2" slits at both top edges; some chain stitch; long cord attached to one side at slit bottom; two tiered tassel at end; red and green silk with thick fabric core; striped lining
dimension:
7 7/8 x 5 in. (20 x 12.7 cm)
5 1/2 in. (13.97 cm) (object part, tassel combination)
title: Karakal Pak Bag
